pkgmetadata.longdescription: =====Django Cronfield=====Django CRON field providing nice javascript-enabled User Interface and Crontab format validation.Works perfectly also with standard Django Admin interface.Uses jQuery library ver. 1.7.2 hosted on Google CDNRequirements-----------Django 1.4+Python 2.7+Quick start-----------1. Add "cronfield" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this:: INSTALLED_APPS = ( ... 'cronfield', )2. Use CronField in your models.py:: from cronfield.models import CronField ... CRON_string = CronField()3. Look at your model in the Django Admin interface (edit model page).
